Name: Tres Compadres Margarita
Ingredients: 10 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime wedge & salt rim (optional).
Review: A well-balanced, tasty twist on the standard Margarita.
History: Created in 1999 by Robert Plotkin and Raymon Flores of BarMedia, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Tres Compadres Margarita contains 140 calories
